**BCFNGS-project-management** is a Shiny app for a project management system for the BCF NGS core facility.

The NGS lab of the Core Facility provides sequencing as a service. We recommend contacting us before the start of your experiment. In collaboration with the Bioinformatics Core Facility, we provide the following services. 

* Assistance with experimental design of the studies (required number of samples and replicates)
* Assistance with the use of NGS open source analysis tools
* Data analysis on a collaborative basis

If you have any further questions, please do not hesitate to [contact us @ omicsdesk](mailto:omicsdesk.biochem.mpg.de)!
